articles.title: Texas stunner: Democrat Taylor Rehmet flips Republican state Senate district Trump won by 17 points
articles.description:
At Mar-a-Lago on Sunday, Trump told reporters, “I’m not involved in that. That’s a local Texas race.”

The post Texas stunner: Democrat Taylor Rehmet flips Republican state Senate district Trump won by 17 points appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Democrat Taylor Rehmet won a Texas Senate seat previously held by Republicans.
Rehmet flipped a district that Trump won by 17 points in the last election.
This shift may influence Democratic strategies in upcoming Boston elections.

articles.title: Red Sox reportedly trade pitcher Jordan Hicks to White Sox
articles.description:
Boston originally acquired Hicks in 2025 as part of the Rafael Devers trade.

The post Red Sox reportedly trade pitcher Jordan Hicks to White Sox appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox trade pitcher Jordan Hicks to the White Sox on February 1, 2026.
Hicks was originally acquired in the 2025 Rafael Devers trade.
This trade may affect Boston's pitching depth for the upcoming season.
